DOC.brief_summary: Sepsis significant cause morbidity mortality among newborn . Due strict criterion order diagnose prevent early-onset group B streptococcal ( EOGBS ) sepsis , many infant undergo sepsis workup due risk factor alone , even though asymptomatic . Our goal evaluate number newborn undergo sepsis workup due risk factor alone , determine number newborn positive blood culture , establish way reduce number asymptomatic infant undergo sepsis workup .
DOC.brief_title: Neonatal Sepsis Workup High Risk Newborns - Evaluation Need Ways Prevent
DOC.criteria: Term newborns blood culture take first 48 hrs Preterm newborn Septic/ill appear newborn Newborns require admission NICU
